entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12.
